lead_paragraph: Chicago guard Dwyane Wade was fined $25,000 by the NBA on Friday for making a throat slashing gesture after hitting a late 3-pointer in his Bulls debut Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Dwyane Wade Fined $25,000 for Throat Slashing Gesture
headline.main: Dwyane Wade Fined $25,000 for Throat Slashing Gesture
